item.title: Bang&Olufsen MMC20EN Vintage Cartridge Test
item.description:
The MMC20EN cartridge that came with my recently restored Beogram 4004 parts was tested using my evolving cartridge testing methodology. My approach involves evaluating the frequency range and trackability of a cartridge. For this, I utilize three test records: the Analogue Audio Ultimate Test LP for checking frequency response up to 20kHz, the Fisher Test & Performance Standard Quadradisc to observe 30kHz carrier frequency reproduction, and the Clearaudio Trackability Test Record to assess the cantilever suspension’s condition at different groove amplitudes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bang-olufsen-mmc20en-vintage-cartridge-test/
